channel.title: My construction skill idea!
channel.description:
Construction skill
First of all, to start this skill you need a hammer, and a chisel in your inventory. Second, To build a certain item (will think up later) You need either a plain log, an oak log, a teak log, or a mahogany log in your inventory and eventually in later updates some silk (to replace cloth). You then use the chisel with an anvil to display the item u wish to make, and click it to gain construction experience.
Please do not leach off this topic or copy my idea because I thought this up this morning while trying to get some sleep (I seem to think harder when I try to get sum sleep lol) If anyone can post any coding of this for me please reply or pm me back ty..

item.title: My construction skill idea!
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

[b]Well, I’m Behind The Scenes Now With Satan And Me, Him And The Poh Community Have Already Created Where You Use Normal Log With A Hammer And Nails, And You Get A Wooden Fence. This Shall Be Released In Player Owned Houses Version 4 !

See My Signature !

Thanks,

-Jump On Java[/b]

item.title: My construction skill idea!
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

ya but this construction skill is different and a little more realistic and a little similar to the actual skill… and it would be kinda easy for a good coder… If I had the time I could do it on my own but I dont have a client atm and im kinda lazy… I already know how to code this anyways but it will just be time consuming. lol[br][size=1]Posted at: 08 December 2006, 17:55:52[/size][hr] If anyone copies my idea i will be very angry… One, it took me a while to think this up and 2nd I h8 leachers because they cant come up with a f***ing idea by them selves! :mad:
